alert.note: Alert for Palo Alto; Pocahontas (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 8:41PM CDT until August 11 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pocahontas County in northwestern Iowa... Southern Palo Alto County in northwestern Iowa... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 841 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Webb, or 18 miles southeast of Spencer In Clay County, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Laurens, Rush Lake, Mallard, Havelock, Plover, and Curlew. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
